          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrical charging of a comb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Aufladung eines Kammes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplissage électrique d'un peigne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carregar elétrico de um comb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricarsi elettrico di un pettine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική χρέωση μιας χτένας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carga eléctrica de un peine</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing that a comb can be electrically charged by rubbing it against your hair.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">comb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubbing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die zeigen, daß ein
Kamm elektrisch aufgeladen werden kann, indem man ihn gegen Ihr Haar 
löscht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations prouvant qu'un 
peigne peut être électriquement chargé en le frottant contre vos 
cheveux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram 
que um comb pode eletricamente ser carregado friccionando o de 
encontro a seu cabelo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che indicano 
che un pettine può essere caricato elettricamente lucidandolo contro 
i vostri capelli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι μια χτένα 
μπορεί να χρεωθεί ηλεκτρικά με το τρίψιμο του ενάντια στην τρίχα
σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran que un 
peine puede ser cargado eléctricamente frotándolo contra su pelo.</string>
          </description>
